Entry.Value: Listen to tape recordings of relevant intel.
Listen to tapes acquired in the field.
Set music that plays when your helicopter appears.

Action Type is recommended for fans of the traditional "Metal Gear Solid" series. With this type, pressing <I=G=CQC> will perform a CQC attack. Holding <I=G=CQC> will grab and restrain an enemy for as long as the button is held. <I=G=MOVE> + <I=G=EVADE> will perform a Quick Dive.

Shooter Type is recommended for fans of FPS (first-person shooting) games. With this type, pressing <I=G=CQC> will perform a CQC attack. Holding <I=G=CQC> will grab and restrain an enemy for as long as the button is held. <I=G=MOVE> + <I=G=EVADE> will perform a Quick Dive.

Take a screenshot and transfer it to a connected smart device. This feature cannot be used unless a smart device is connected.

Save and return to title screen.
Change the settings of your monitor.
Set whether readying a weapon will make you aim automatically at enemies.
Set whether to remember viewpoint type after aiming a weapon.
Set the controls for vertical camera movement.
Set the controls for horizontal camera movement.
Set speed that camera moves in third-person view.
Set speed that camera moves in shoulder view.
Set speed that camera moves in first-person view.
Set speed that camera changes views.
Set whether a message is displayed upon setting a new trial record.
Set whether markers appear in the in-game world. Even if this is set to OFF, markers will still appear on the iDroid map.
Toggle the display of the reticle when readying weapons (shoulder view only).
Toggle the display of the direction enemy presence is sensed when about to be spotted.
Toggle the display of the direction from which you take damage.
Toggle the display of action icons.
Set how weapon/item icons are displayed.
Set whether Reflex Mode activates when spotted by an enemy. Clear a mission without entering Reflex Mode once to earn a score bonus.
Adjust brightness so that both images on the left and right are visible.
Automatically assigns new recruits or staff in the Waiting Room according to their suitability to each unit. Does not include staff already assigned to units.
Automatically reassigns all staff according to their suitability to each unit. Includes staff already assigned to units.

Set the balance of how each unit expands when Auto Assign is ON. Staff are automatically assigned so that the levels of the various units match this ratio. Does not include staff already assigned to units.

Set whether to use the Chicken Hat after restarting from a checkpoint following a Game Over. If you use the Chicken Hat, enemies will not detect you even if you enter their field of vision (up to 3 times), but it will limit your mission completion rank to an A or below.
This is a work of fiction. Details of actual persons, organizations, events, etc. featured within include fictitious elements.
Grading evaluations have begun for judging Diamond Dogs' performance among other private forces operating within the private military market.
・Three times per day, virtual battles with equal rank PFs will be conducted automatically on the server. The win/loss results will be used to evaluate your overall fighting capability.
・Overall gradings will be re-evaluated each week based on overall battle performance within your particular rank category.
Grading Order Among Equal Rank PFs
The gradings of all registered private forces have been changed. View the new grading of your registered private force.
Base Development Unit has been established.
Additional platforms can now be constructed. *View the iDroid's BASE FACILITIES menu for details.
Dispatch Missions are now available. *View the iDroid's COMBAT DEPLOYMENT menu for details.
Animal Conservation Platform has been constructed. *Move between platforms using the iDroid's RETURN TO MOTHERBASE menu while in the Aerial Command Center.
FOBs can now be constructed. *View the iDroid's BASE FACILITIES menu for details.
FOB Missions are now available. *View the iDroid's FOB MISSIONS menu for details.
FOB security settings can now be configured, and security devices developed. *View the iDroid's SECURITY SETTINGS and DEVELOPMENT menus for details.
Quarantine Platform has been constructed. *Move between platforms using the iDroid's RETURN TO MOTHERBASE menu while in the Aerial Command Center.
Nuclear weapons can now be developed or disposed of. *View the iDroid's RESOURCES menu for details.
Battle Gear (buddy) can now be deployed.
Vehicle supply drops can now be requested.
Prosthetic arms can now be developed.
Support helicopter armament can now be developed.
Equipment for D-Horse can now be developed.
Equipment for D-Dog can now be developed.
Equipment for Quiet is now available for development.
D-Walker armament can now be developed.
Battle Gear armament can now be developed.
Support helicopter can now be customized.
Battle Gear can now be customized.
"Do it (defecate)" command for D-Horse is now available.
"Bark" command for D-Dog is now available.
"Take aim" command for Quiet is now available.
"Cover me/Cease cover" commands for Quiet are now available.
"Fire (grenade ricochet)" command for Quiet is now available.
"%s" trial is now available. *View TRIAL RECORDS in the Pause menu for details.

Records of your in-game progress to date.

Set how weapon switching is performed when the Quick Dive Button <I=G=EVADE> is pressed while readying a weapon. 2-Slot: Switch alternately between primary and secondary weapons. 3-Slot: Switch between primary, secondary, and support weapons in that order.
Set the method for selecting commands on the Call Menu. Call Button: Release the Call Button (<I=G=CALL>) to use the selected command. Right Stick: Press <I=G=CAMERA> to select and use a command.
